程序包 us.codecraft.webmagic.thread

类 CountableThreadPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.thread.CountableThreadPool

  • public class CountableThreadPool
extends Object
    Thread pool for workers.

    Use ExecutorService as inner implement.

    New feature:

    1. Block when thread pool is full to avoid poll many urls without process.

    2. Count of thread alive for monitor.
    从以下版本开始:
    0.5.0
    作者:
    code4crafer@gmail.com
